title: Augusta County: Jedediah Hotchkiss to Sara A. Hotchkiss, January 25, 1863
summary: Hotchkiss imagines what his family is doing on a Sunday, describes a skirmish with the Yankees across the river, and discusses Northern politics and troop enlistments.
keywords: Family, Death/Casualities, Church/Religious Activity, Home Front, Battle Description, National Government, Enlistment, Women, Military Authority, African Americans, Slavery, American Civil War
